global_view_mode.description: Apply OCIO view selection to all media.

untonemapped_mode.description: Avoid LUT inversion for external media.

default_ocio_config.description: Select the OpenColorIO config xSTUDIO should use. Note that this will NOT override colour management rules driven by pipeline integration plugins, if you have any installed, or the OpenColorIO Environment Variable if it is set.

custom_ocio_config.description: Select the OpenColorIO config path, used if the default OCIO config setting is set to Custom

preferred_config_version.description: Select the OpenColorIO config version xSTUDIO should use. This is only effective when using a media hook plugin and letting xSTUDIO know about the different OCIO config versions available (if applicable to your pipeline). This setting is currently read-only as it is defined in a workstation specific configuration file.

ocio_env_var.description: This field shows you the OCIO environment variable. If set, it should point to an ocio config file on disk or a builtin config using the ocio:// syntax. Unless you have pipeline integration plugins installed, it will take precedence over the settings below.
